events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision on the highway that occurred yesterday afternoon, initiating the claim process for damages.
After reviewing the initial report, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords related to car damage and collision.
An experienced agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim to provide personalized assistance throughout the process.
The customer was formally notified that the insurance company has received and acknowledged the auto accident claim for processing.
The agent requested all necessary documents including vehicle registration, police report, and photos of the collision damage.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, enabling the investigation team to proceed with their assessment quickly.
An investigation into the car accident was initiated to evaluate the circumstances and confirm liability for the damages claimed.
The investigation concluded with a favorable outcome confirming the liability of the opposite driver in the accident.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and associated expenses was proposed to the customer based on investigation results.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout the claim process.
The claim received formal approval by management, confirming the insurer's commitment to honor the agreed settlement terms.
Payment for the settlement was issued to the customer, ensuring timely compensation for the damages sustained in the auto accident.
The claim file was officially closed as the payment was completed and the customer confirmed the resolution of the accident claim.
For record-keeping purposes, the fully processed auto accident claim was archived in the company database.
